typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ï»¿"Nombre"} as string,
		{F. Ini} as timestamp 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		{F. Ter} as timestamp 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		{m3 Real} as double,
		{m3 Prg} as string,
		{mm Real} as string,
		{mm Prg} as string,
		{T. Oper} as timestamp 'HH:mm',
		Huerto as string,
		Sectores as string,
		Fertirrigado as string,
		cc1 as string,
		cc2 as string,
		cc3 as string,
		cc4 as string,
		cc5 as string,
		cc6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		{ï»¿"Nombre"} as string,
		{F. Ini} as string,
		{F. Ter} as string,
		{m3 Real} as string,
		{m3 Prg} as string,
		{mm Real} as string,
		{mm Prg} as string,
		{T. Oper} as string,
		Huerto as string,
		Sectores as string,
		Fertirrigado as string,
		cc1 as string,
		cc2 as string,
		cc3 as string,
		cc4 as string,
		cc5 as string,
		cc6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
union select(mapColumn(
		Segmento = {ï»¿"Nombre"},
		FechaInicial = {F. Ini},
		FechaTermino = {F. Ter},
		m3Real = {m3 Real},
		{T. Oper},
		Sectores
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Seleccionar1
Columnaderivada1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Modificarfila1
Seleccionar1 derive(idFecha = year(FechaInicial)*10000+month(FechaInicial)*100+dayOfMonth(FechaInicial),
		NombreTabla = 'ThRiego') ~> Columnaderivada1
source1, source2 union(byName: true)~> union
Modificarfila1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		idRiego as integer,
		idFecha as integer,
		FechaInicio as date,
		FechaFin as date,
		m3Real as double,
		TiempoOperacion as timestamp,
		Sector as string,
		NombreTabla as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dbo.ThRiego'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FechaInicio = FechaInicial,
		FechaFin = FechaTermino,
		m3Real,
		TiempoOperacion = {T. Oper},
		Sector = Segmento,
		idFecha,
		NombreTabla
	)) ~> sink1
